title: The Thracian Goblet
description: Once again, Danny and Heather are immersed in a challenge beyond their wildest dreams. On their new and exciting adventure, they become involved with a secret community of mythical creatures, an underground society of black-market antiquities dealers, a search for a long-lost Bulgar treasure, and a race against time with a mysterious and depraved adversary. Danny learns more about his wondrous book along the way and discovers that he has a strange rival for possession of the miraculous Longmeadow’s Rarely Used, Nearly Forgotten, and Generally Unnecessary Knowledge and Facts – a challenge he will not shy away from. Join the teens and a surprising cast of characters as they journey up the Rhine and down the Danube, in search of the Thracian Goblet.
author: Ken Janisch
